install.name: commportal
install.author: Shape5.com
install.description:
CommPortal - Shape 5 July Club 2008 Template.
Click here to visit Shape5.com

param.name: spacer1
param.default: Make sure to hover your mouse over each title in this column for a full description of what each field does.

param.name: xml_menuname
param.label: Menu Name
param.description: What menu would you like to use for the default default menu?

param.name: xml_s5_loggedin
param.label: Logged in Mode
param.description: Enter logged in mode. This will show only a select few module positions when a user is not logged in, restricting his site acces.

param.name: xml_s5_body_width
param.label: Body Width
param.description: What width would you like for the website?

param.name: xml_s5_left_width
param.label: Left Column Width
param.description: What width in pixels would you like the left column to be?

param.name: xml_s5_right_width
param.label: Right Column Width
param.description: What width in pixels would you like the right column to be?

param.name: xml_s5_menu
param.label: Menu Type
param.description: Enter in 1 for No-MooMenu, 2 for Suckerfish, 3 for Fading No-Moo, or 4 for Nothing

param.name: xml_s5_boxdrop
param.label: S5 Box Drop Down
param.description: What text would you like for the button that closes the s5 box drop down

param.name: xml_s5_boxone
param.label: S5 Box 1 Width
param.description: What width in pixels would you like the first s5 box popup box to be? (height will auto adjust to content)

param.name: xml_s5_boxonehide
param.label: S5 Box 1 Hide?
param.description: Do you want to hide this s5 box when a user is logged in?

param.name: xml_s5_boxonebut
param.label: S5 Box 1 button text
param.description: Enter what text you would like for the close button.

param.name: xml_s5_boxonetext
param.label: S5 Box 1 popup text
param.description: Enter what text you would like for the close button located in the S5 Box window.

param.name: xml_s5_boxtwo
param.label: S5 Box 2 Width
param.description: What width in pixels would you like the second s5 box popup box to be? (height will auto adjust to content)

param.name: xml_s5_boxtwobut
param.label: Logged out text
param.description: Enter what text you would like for the close button when logged out and logged in.

param.name: xml_s5_boxtwobutin
param.label: Logged in text
param.description: Enter the name that you'd like for the S5 Box tab.

param.name: xml_s5_boxtwotext
param.label: S5 Box 2 popup text
param.description: Enter what text you would like for the close button located in the s5 box window.

param.name: xml_s5_repeatback
param.label: Background Repeat
param.description: Enter the URL to a background image that will repeat throughout the body of the template

param.name: xml_s5_colorback
param.label: Color Background
param.description: Enter the color in HEX of the background you would like for the template body

param.name: xml_s5_tooltips
param.label: Tooltips
param.description: Enable tooltips

param.name: xml_s5_lytebox
param.label: Enable Lytebox?
param.description: Enable the lytebox feature for your images NOTE: it is highly recommened to disable if you are not planning to use

param.name: xml_s5_clr_fix
param.label: S5 Clr Fix
param.description: S5 - Clear Fix Script - This template was written with 100% tableless css. Unfortunately there are some components that are poorly written and conflict with tableless designs; this is an issue with the component and not the template. To correct some of these issues we have written this simple script. If you are seeing a large gap above some of your components you can try enabling this script (choose enabled or disabled - only use this script if absolutly necessary). In most cases this will fix the issue but not all. If you are still experiencing the problem this is most likely a problem with the component.
